title: Article Processing Charge
content:
All articles published in our journal are subject to an article processing charge (APC).
The APC covers the costs of peer review, editing, hosting, and archiving.
There are no submission charges.

title: Editorial workflow
content:
The editorial workflow includes the following steps:
- Initial submission and screening
- Peer review by subject matter experts
- Editorial decision and revisions
- Final acceptance and publication

title: Article types
content:
We accept a range of article types including:
- Original Research Articles
- Review Articles
- Case Reports
- Short Communications
- Letters to the Editor

title: Language
content: Submissions must be written in English. Authors are encouraged to seek professional language editing services if necessary.

title: Copyright
content: Authors retain the copyright of their work and grant the journal a license to publish.

title: Open Access
content: All articles are published under open access terms, ensuring free and unlimited access to scholarly research.

title: Special Issues
content: Special issues are thematic collections of articles. Proposals for guest-edited issues are welcome.

title: Cover letter
content: Include a cover letter summarizing the importance and novelty of your submission.

title: Article structure
content: Your manuscript should follow the structure: Abstract, Introduction, Methods, Results, Discussion, References.

title: Graphical abstract
content: Provide a visual summary of your article's key findings or methodology.

title: Tables
content: Ensure tables are clearly labeled and referenced in the text.

title: Supplementary material
content: Include additional data, images, or figures that support the article but are not essential in the main text.

title: Studies in animals and humans
content: Ethical approval is required for all studies involving animals or human participants.

title: Informed consent and patient details
content: Informed consent must be obtained from patients before publication.

title: Clinical trial results
content: Clinical trials must be registered, and results reported in accordance with CONSORT guidelines.

title: Research data
content: Authors are encouraged to share their datasets in public repositories and include a data availability statement.

title: Responsible use of AI language models (ChatGPT)
content: Clearly disclose the use of AI tools like ChatGPT in writing or analysis and ensure human oversight.

title: Editorial policy
content: Editorial decisions are made independently, without influence from sponsors or third parties.

title: Publishing ethics
content: We follow COPE guidelines on publication ethics and malpractice.

title: Introduction
content: The peer-review process ensures the validity, quality, and originality of submitted articles.

title: How to join the reviewer team
content: Experts can apply to join the reviewer pool by submitting their credentials and areas of expertise.

title: Special attention
content: Certain submissions may receive expedited review due to urgency or impact.

title: About us
content: We are an academic publisher committed to disseminating high-quality, peer-reviewed research.

title: Contact us
content: For inquiries, email support@journalpublisher.org or visit our contact page.
